nodes.text: Meatlump Mono was a viral infection transmitted through the act of kissing another beings mouth. Droolers working for the Meatlump Gang were known to occasionally transmit it to customers while operating a kissing booth within the confines of their sewer hideout beneath the streets of Coronet City.

Meatlump Mono was a viral infection which weakened players in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. It was added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
